title: dinam hanumanai ninai
sahitya:
dinam hanumanai ninai manamE ninaindAl tIrum nam pazha vinagaLumE tavarAmal


anupallavi

  anaghan shivan anisham koNDavanai anranai mArutattin maindanAm avanai


caraNam    rAman pAdattil sharaN aDaindavanai rAman tulaivihil tuyar tuDaittavanai
kAmanai venravanai kAlam kaDandavanai dEvanin sOdaranai vAnara nAyakanai
